name: The Witching Hour - FNAF Freeroam
description:
The Witching Hour - FNAF Freeroam

The Witching Hour is a Five Night's at Freddy's fan game set on the first location in the FNAF Series.  You are a paranormal investigator working for the government, the establishment Freddy Fazbear's Pizza was shutdown a week prior to being reported to the government, the place has been stripped down. Everybody associated with Freddy Fazbear's has received treatment and Class A Amnesiacs, all prior customers have been detained and interviewed. You're job is to spend Five Night's at the Pizzeria to investigate the establishment and come to a conclusion if the place needs to demolished and the animatronics sent off to containment at a secret location.

Good Luck,

Agent █████████

███   Foundation


Installation:

Step 1: Download the RAR or ZIP file for your select operating system.

Step 2: Unzip or Unpackage the .RAR file with whatever unzipping application your use. (Our preference is WinRAR)

Step 3: Go into the 'TheWitchingHour' folder and double click on the .exe file to launch the game.

Step 4: Select your graphics preset (dependant on your hardware) Medium and up is recommended for best performance and best looking graphics.

Step 5: Select your resolution and select if you want fullscreen or not, press play and enjoy the game! (Post any bugs or glitches in the comments section, that is really appreciated)

Minimum System Requirements:

Windows: 

OS: Windows XP (Service Pack 3)/ Windows 7/8/8.1/10

CPU: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or up

RAM : 1GB Memory or more

GPU : 512mb VRAM

DX: 9.0c or up

Storage: 100mb

Mac:

OS: OSX 10+

CPU: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or up

RAM: 1 GB

GPU: Open GL 3.2 Compatible, 512mb

Storage: 100mb

But this should work on almost any system that isn't too old like (2006+ atleast)

All FNAF Intellectual Property belongs to Scott Cawthorn. We did not create the FNAF Series or the IP.

But huge thanks to Scott Cawthorn for being an awesome guy and letting people make fan games! unlike nintenpoo
